author: Steve Weeks
content:
The album cover you picked for today's song, along with the one from the other day, reminds me an image I made during "Hot August Nights" in Reno, NV US.  A large gathering of car buffs.  Not E.C or B.B. in the ride, but it kind of caught the essence of the time.

http://www.flickr.com/photos/42171752@N05/4559099257/
